entries.player_sorry_4: I was just about to take care of that.
entries.player_sorry_3: I was just about to take care of that.
entries.player_sorry_2: I was just about to take care of that.
entries.player_sorry_1: I was just about to take care of that.
entries.player_reset_4: I have decided I don't want to do your job.
entries.player_reset_3: I have decided I don't want to do your job.
entries.player_reset_2: I have decided I don't want to do your job.
entries.player_reset_1: I have decided I don't want to do your job.
entries.npc_reset_4: Raglith think you not reliable. Get gone.
entries.npc_reset_3: Raglith think you not reliable. Get gone.
entries.npc_reset_2: Raglith think you not reliable. Get gone.
entries.npc_reset_1: Raglith think you not reliable. Get gone.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Go and kill the lantern birds to prevent the Ewoks from using their feathers for healing.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Go back to Raglith and let him know you destroyed the birds.
entries.waypoint_description_3: Go kill an Elder Ewok so Raglith can make a new rug.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Go and destroy the lost Ewok hunters.
entries.return_waypoint_description_3: Return to Raglith with the Ewok pelt.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Those lost Ewoks aren't likely to find their way home again. Return to Raglith.
entries.player_sorry: I was just about to take care of that.
entries.player_reset: I have decided I don't want to do your job.
entries.player_3_2: Why don't you capture the birds and learn to make the medicine yourself?
entries.player_3_1: What is in this for me?
entries.player_2_2: This isn't the type of job for me.
entries.player_1_3: I'll find an Ewok to skin.
entries.npc_work_1: Raglith think job not finished. Why?
entries.npc_reward_3: You got good eye, this Ewok make good rug. You earn boots, money, and one other thing: Raglith put in good word for you with Fightmaster Jorak.
entries.npc_reward_2: Ah good, much birds dead. Raglith well pleased. Here is money. Come back later.
entries.npc_reward_1: Raglith sees on you the blood of ewok whelps. Raglith pleased. You not make mess of job, come back if want more work.
entries.npc_reset: Raglith think you not reliable. Get gone.
entries.npc_noloc_3: Not sure this is best thing for you to do. Me think about it a bit. You come back later.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Not sure this is best thing for you to do. Me think about it a bit. You come back later.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Not sure this is best thing for you to do. Me think about it a bit. You come back later.
entries.npc_failure_3: Raglith not surprised you make giant mess of whole thing. Get out.
entries.npc_failure_2: Raglith not surprised you make giant mess of whole thing. Get out.
entries.npc_failure_1: Raglith not surprised you make giant mess of whole thing. Get out.
entries.npc_breech_3: Tekara! Gabatana! Numala mub aba kuboro!
entries.npc_backtowork_3: Move along then, nothing for you until you bring rug.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Get moving, Ewoks wont stay lost forever.
entries.npc_4_3: You get credits like always. Also Raglith have old pair of boots for you.
entries.npc_4_2: Raglith has no need for dirty Ewok medicine. Now you want kill or not?
entries.npc_4_1: Raglith is guard for mighty Marauder citadel. Has money from Fightmaster Jorak for them who serves good.
entries.npc_3_2: You think you too good for Raglith now? Feh.
entries.npc_3_1: What you want then? Get out the way.
entries.npc_2_3: Ewok must have thick wooly coat. You go over that way, lots of Ewoks.
entries.npc_2_2: Big bright glowy birds way over there. Go, find, kill.
entries.npc_2_1: That's good. I got word Ewok hunters lost on edge of Marauder land. Go over, go kill.
entries.npc_1_3: You do well for Marauders so far. Now me have something you can do for Raglith. I want a rug for my sleeping place. An Ewok rug.
entries.npc_1_2: Good work last time. More different job this time. Ewoks healing themself with feathers from bird. No like bird. Kill birds. Yes?
entries.npc_1_1: You want something? Look, Raglith got work to do, ok? If you want help Raglith you speak up. Elseways get out.
entries.notyet: Raglith not think you friend of Marauders.
entries.notit_3: This not make good rug. You try again.
entries.notit_2: You not do the job Raglith asks. You wanna try to get it right, okay?
entries.notit_1: Not what Raglith asked for. You have problem following orders maybe?
entries.next: You maybe good. Fightmaster Jorak need more like you. Go see Fightmaster. He give you more important job.
entries.cant_work: Raglith not give job to someone busy already.
